snippet.title: Painter Blazer reveal trailer
snippet.description:
Painting and cartoony arcade action.

This is Painter Blazer.

It is a mix between action, arcade and light puzzle games. You are playing as Blazer, a bunny who likes to paint. He finds a new job as a painter but the company is no good trying to replace workers with robots. Your job is to paint and blow up the robots.

___________________________________________________________________________________________________

Credits

aapiarts - Game design, sprites, art, sound effects, code
wobwobrob - Music ( https://wobwobrob.newgrounds.com/ )
GGishere - Voice acting ( https://ggishere.newgrounds.com/ )
StarrySail - Playtesting ( https://www.instagram.com/sealing_the_end/ )
Lowpoly_Skinwalker - Playtesting ( https://www.instagram.com/lowpoly_skinwalker/ )


Ending music by FDA
Endless Handbag Loop ( https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1683 )

___________________________________________________________________________________________________

Painter Blazer Instagram account: https://www.instagram.com/painterblazer/
